DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate benefit apply Selective Internal Radiation Therapy ( SIRT ) use SIR-Spheres Y-90 resin microspheres prior receive systemic chemotherapy treatment ( cisplatin-gemcitabine , CIS-GEM ) patient unresectable intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma . Half patient randomize CIS-GEM chemotherapy plus SIRT , half patient randomized CIS-GEM alone .
DOC.brief_title: SIRT Followed CIS-GEM Chemotherapy Versus CIS-GEM Chemotherapy Alone 1st Line Treatment Patients With Unresectable Intrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical study prospective , multicenter , randomize , control study evaluate SIR-Spheres Y-90 resin microspheres follow cisplatin-gemcitabine ( CIS-GEM ) chemotherapy vs. CIS-GEM chemotherapy alone first-line treatment patient unresectable intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma . Randomized patient follow death , withdrawal consent , end study .
